trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Agit comme un conteneur pour un groupe d'activités qui est exécuté lorsque la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> démarre l'exécution.
Cette classe ne peut pas être héritée.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> agit comme une <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> pour toutes les activités qu'elle contient.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Les classes <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> peuvent être incluses dans la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Si une <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> existe dans une <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> est la première activité exécutée lorsque la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> commence à s'exécuter.

trans-unit.source: In some ways the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: À certains égards, la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> est comme un gestionnaire `OnEnterState`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> n'est pas une activité obligatoire de la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> est un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, ce qui signifie que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> peut contenir d'autres activités.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> ne peut pas contenir d'activité implémentant l'interface <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>, qui inclut toutes les activités <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> et l'activité <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: Une <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> s'exécute dans la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, une manière non bloquante qui prépare la <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> à recevoir des événements.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> peut contenir une activité <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>, afin qu'elle puisse modeler un ordinateur d'états où les transitions se produisent d'état en état sans recevoir d'événement.

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: Dans ce sens, l'ordinateur d'états se comporte comme un workflow séquentiel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple suivant montre comment créer une nouvelle instance d'un objet <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the State Initialization SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple est issu de l'exemple du Kit de développement logiciel State Initialization (SDK).
Pour plus d’informations, consultez [l’état de l’initialisation exemple](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9053202f-2567-4428-a4a2-85423963646b).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nom de l'activité défini par l'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity" /> à l'aide du nom de l'activité.
